All-round marketeer and project manager with more than 15 years experience in marketing, branding and communication strategic analyst on project basis for diverse industries in B2C and B2B:

• Post merger and acquisitions strategy and change management.
• Project management from beginning to end.
• Communication and marketing strategies to increase market share & share of mind in different contexts, regions and life cycles.  
• Competition analysis and benchmark.
• Content Management and producing
• Events planning/creation and execution.
• Customer care and market research
• Digital and offline
•  FMCG, Tech, Oil & Gas, Healthcare, Tourism, Manufacturing


SKILLS

profile_positions.description:
• Work closely with business and regional sales worldwide to develop and execute a global customer marketing and communication plan in line with business and sales objectives. 
• The plan should include a clear overall positioning, marketing campaigns, product launches, consumer insights, value propositions, secure the implementation of marcom campaigns and monitor progress, evaluate effectiveness and adjust accordingly, while working with regional marketing managers for local execution. 
• Access current and future market and communication developments, competitor developments and consumer behavior and translates this into useful and pragmatic sales tools. 
•  Exchange developments, best practices and develop and execute special marketing projects.

Results: 
• Successfully launched Delvo(r)Guard bioprotective cultures new range
• Plant-based dairy alternatives segment dairy positioning strategy and execution
• Customer presentations and inspirations days for players as Muller, Biedronka,
• Successfully launched Delvo(r)Plant Go, an enzyme solution to improve efficiency and simplify the production process of oat-based drinks
• Budget 2023 planning
•  Media articles coordination for different subsegments as fermented milk products, milk, hydrocolloids
•  Launched successfully a new toolkit for Plant-based fermented products together with business managers, sales and account managers.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for strategical and operational marketing and communications management for dairy based beverages and cheese in more than 20 countries in Africa and Middle East, envolving:
- Product launches and portfolio management
- Stakeholders relationship management 
- Market and consumer researches, insights collection and actions
- Competition analysis and bechmarking
- Marketing and communication planning 
- Branding and brand positioning (Dutch Lady, Alaska, Frico cheese, Rainbow, Coast, Bonne Rouge, Kroon cheese, Peak, Greenland)
- Digital, trade and offline campaigns management 
- Global strategy translation to each one of the countries considering their peculiarities
- Budget and performance management
- Agencies, printing companies and suppliers management
Results: Market research and insights collection resulting in a new brand positioning for Alaska and Greenland in Haiti, 14 quarter plan for Guinea based on market visit, research implemented locally and distributor insights, new source options, Peak 500ml TetraPak launch in 6 countries, Digital communication strategy action in Lybia, among others,
